H3.text: who did jennifer lawrence play in x men. Mystique

A4.text: She played Mystique for the third time in X-Men: Apocalypse (2016).

A5.text: She portrayed the shapeshifting mutant Mystique, a role played by Rebecca Romijn in the earlier films.
